title: Constitutional amendment to be made with consensus: Kiyani
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 16 (APP):Member National Assembly of Pakistan Muslim League-N, Bilal Azhar Kiyani on Monday said that constitutional amendment would be made with consensus of the political parties.
Amendment in the constitution is need of the hour, he said while talking to a private television channel.
Increasing number of judges would help resolve large number of cases pending in the courts, he said.
Commenting on appointment of judges in the courts, he said, there is a mechanism for appointing judges in the courts.Â  In reply to a question about support of the coalition partners for completing task of the constitutional amendment,
he said, we will have required numbers before presenting the document in the house. He further said that legal reforms would help provide speedy justice to the people.
